name: Philadelphia School District, to use, Appellant, v. B. A. Shrages Co., Inc., et al.
name_abbreviation: Philadelphia School District v. B. A. Shrages Co.

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Philadelphia School District, to use, Appellant, v. B. A. Shrages Co., Inc., et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Keller of the Superior Court.
Judgment affirmed.
Reported in 134 Pa. Superior Ct. 533.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Emanuel Moss, of Moss <& Moss, for appellant.
Robert G. Fable, Jr., with him Raymond A. White, Jr., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Philadelphia School District, to use, Appellant, v. B. A. Shrages Co., Inc., et al.
Argued December 7, 1939.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Emanuel Moss, of Moss <& Moss, for appellant.
Robert G. Fable, Jr., with him Raymond A. White, Jr., for appellee.
December 8, 1939:
